verbs.description: As [V: expected] , Donald Trump withdrew the United States from the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action ( JCPOA ) , aka the Iran nuclear agreement , yesterday . And as expected , he either lied or is abysmally ignorant of what that agreement actually does . Paul Waldman absolutely nailed this one : This decision is deeply uninformed , utterly illogical , inimical to the interests …
